dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: ...directly on the beach, can you even imagine? It’s, uh, called Reconnect.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...directly on the beach, can you even imagine? It's, uh, called Reconnect.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, joy. Another tech exhibition. On a beach, so... sand in the circuits?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, joy. Another tech exhibition. On a beach, so... sand in the circuits?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, listen, this is Z Empire. They're, like, massive. This one's in Athens, Greece, Grand Resort Lagonissi.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, listen, this is Z Empire. They're, like, massive. This one's in Athens, Greece, Grand Resort Lagonissi.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens. It will take place from September 28 to October 1 at Grand Resort Lagonissi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Greece. Right. So, you're saying it's a holiday with a side of corporate jargon?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Greece. Right. So, you're saying it's a holiday with a side of corporate jargon?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's, uh, the place to be! Five thousand attendees, global players, decision-makers, all converging. Like Dubai and Hong Kong, but... Greek.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's, uh, the place to be! Five thousand attendees, global players, decision-makers, all converging. Like Dubai and Hong Kong, but... Greek.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All the key players of the electronics industry from all around Greece and abroad will be present. Decision-makers, manufacturers, retailers, and technology experts will join forces in one event that has never happened before in Greece.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Five thousand people in a climate-controlled hall. Riveting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Five thousand people in a climate-controlled hall. Riveting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it's specially built for this! And they have this thing, 90' to Impress, where companies showcase their stuff. Plus the Lagonissi Innovation Awards.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's specially built for this! And they have this thing, ninety' to Impress, where companies showcase their stuff. Plus the Lagonissi Innovation Awards.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For three days, in the specially designed spaces of Grand Resort Lagonissi, the participants will have the opportunity to use the CEO Lounge and network through a series of live sessions and activities - such as 90' to impress where each company will present its portfolio and services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Awards. Uh-huh. Who actually, like, pays attention to those?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Awards. Uh-huh. Who actually, like, pays attention to those?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Everyone! And it’s not just the exhibition, okay? Three nights of themed parties. Lavish gala dinners! Holographic stages at the Achillion Ribas with Saronic Gulf views.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Everyone! And it's not just the exhibition, okay? Three nights of themed parties. Lavish gala dinners! Holographic stages at the Achillion Ribas with Saronic Gulf views.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, special themed parties, gala dinners, and fashion shows will take place at Achillion Ribas, a magnificent venue overlooking the Saronic Gulf.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Holographic stages? For a tech event? Sounds… expensive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Holographic stages? For a tech event? Sounds... expensive.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's all about fusing business and pleasure! World-renowned DJs, international fashion designers. It’s an experience, A, an unparalleled experience.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's all about fusing business and pleasure! World-renowned DJs, international fashion designers. It's an experience, A, an unparalleled experience.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Greek and non-Greek designers, a different one every night, will present their creations and carry us away to a unique experience that combines business and pleasure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, a corporate party with extra steps.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, a corporate party with extra steps.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, uh, it's where the future of electronics is, like, literally being redefined. You can't miss this, it’s groundbreaking!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, uh, it's where the future of electronics is, like, literally being redefined. You can't miss this, it's groundbreaking!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sure. So I should, uh, pack my swimsuit and my business cards?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sure. So I should, uh, pack my swimsuit and my business cards?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah! Exactly! Think of the networking, the, um, cutting-edge insights!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah! Exactly! Think of the networking, the, um, cutting-edge insights!
